content.rendered:
NFR (National Finals Rodeo) fans will be highly appreciated to learn the top 15 qualify for the NFR 2021 in accordance with the PRCA and WPRA standings which are updated as of October 26, 2021. The Las Vegas NFR will be held at the Thomas & Mack Arena from December 2-11, 2021.

Watch NFR 2023 Live Online - SUBSCRIBE HERE

NFR 2023 Streaming info
Streaming
The Cowboy Channel (real-time) Watch Here
RFD-TV (real-time) Watch Here
Cowboy Channel Plus (International) Watch Here

 

Congratulations to all the cowboys and cowgirls who have finished the season in the top 15 of the PRCA and WPRA’s standings in seven main events: steer wrestling, team roping, saddle bronc riding, tie-down roping, bareback riding, barrel racing, and bull riding.

NFR Qualifiers – Barrel Racing

Congrats! to the ladies who have completed the season in the top 15 of the WPRA Barrel Racing standings 2021. Here are the top 15 cowgirls list who are headed to the National Finals Rodeo Barrel Racing (notwithstanding if WPRA has updated the standings we will correct them):

  1. Hailey Kinsel | $113,528.59 | Cotulla, TX
  2. Jordon Briggs | $102,618.20 | Tolar, TX
  3. Shelley Morgan | $94,225.56 | Eustace, TX
  4. Dona Kay Rule | $84,989.96 | Minco, OK
  5. Jessica Routier | $78,847.28 | Buffalo, SD
  6. Cheyenne Wimberley | $77,132.30 | (G) Stephenville, TX
  7. Amanda Welsh | $76,919.48 | Gillette, WY
  8. Nellie Miller | $75,519.15| Cottonwood, CA
  9. Brittany Pozzi Tonozzi | $73,785.70| Lampasas, TX
  10. Emily Miller-Beisel | $73,472.20 | Weatherford, OK
  11. Stevi Hillman | $71,178.49 | Weatherford, TX
  12. Ivy Saebens-Conrado | $70,806.08| Nowata, OK
  13. Wenda Johnson | $67,384.56| Pawhuska, OK
  14. Lisa Lockhart | $65,043.71| Oelrichs, SD
  15. Molly Otto | $64,172.51| Grand Forks, ND

NFR Qualifiers – Bareback Riding

Congrats! to the cowboys who have completed the season in the top 15 of the PRCA Bareback standings 2021. Here are the top 15 cowboys list who are headed to the 2021 National Finals Rodeo Bareback Riding (notwithstanding if PRCA has updated the standings we will correct them):

  1. Tilden Hooper | $161,952.10 | Carthage, TX
  2. Tim O’Connell | $156,056.09 | Zwingle, IA
  3. Clayton Biglow | $142,003.68 | Clements, CA
  4. Caleb Bennett | $140,213.24 | Corvallis, MT
  5. Kaycee Feild | $125,855.67 | Genola, UT
  6. Jess Pope | $110,023.71 | Waverly, KS
  7. Richmond Champion | $98,945.26 | Stevensville, MT
  8. Cole Reiner | $98,215.89 | Kaycee, WY
  9. Orin Larsen | $97,843.73 | Inglis, MB
  10. Garrett Shadbolt $96,013.17 | Merriman, NE
  11. Tanner Aus | $85,674.99 | Granite Falls, MN
  12. Cole Franks | $77,393.35 | Clarendon, TX
  13. R.C. Landingham | $72,128.73 | Hat Creek, CA
  14. Taylor Broussard | $70,204.02 | Estherwood, LA
  15. Zach Hibler | $65,381.32 | Wheeler, TX

NFR Qualifiers – Steer Wrestling

Congrats! to the cowboys who have completed the season in the top 15 of the PRCA Steer Wrestling standings 2021. Here are the top 15 cowboys list who are headed to the 2021 National Finals Rodeo Steer Wrestling (notwithstanding if PRCA has updated the standings we will correct them):

  1. Jacob Talley | $117,256.41 | Keatchie, LA
  2. Jesse Brown | $92,358.49 | Baker City, OR
  3. Dakota Eldridge | $81,783.93 | Elko, NV
  4. Tyler Pearson | $81,609.00 | Louisville, MS
  5. Will Lummus | $79,016.91 | Byhalia, MS
  6. Tyler Waguespack | $76,442.72 | Gonzales, LA
  7. Scott Guenthner | $74,953.44 | Provost, AB
  8. Stetson Jorgensen | $71,668.16 | Blackfoot, ID
  9. Stockton Graves | $71,223.36 | Alva, OK
  10. Dirk Tavenner | $69,048.86 | Rigby, ID
  11. Cody Devers | $67,714.75 | Balko, OK
  12. Rowdy Parrott | $67,254.05 | Mamou, LA
  13. Riley Duvall | $66,720.70 | Checotah, OK
  14. Tristan Martin | $65,071.45 | Sulphur, LA
  15. Curtis Cassidy $64,547.88 | Donalda, AB

NFR Qualifiers – Team Roping (Headers)

Congrats! to the cowboys who have completed the season in the top 15 of the PRCA Team Roping (Headers) standings 2021. Here are the top 15 cowboys list who are headed to the 2021 National Finals Rodeo Team Roping (Headers) (notwithstanding if PRCA has updated the standings we will correct them):

  1. Dustin Egusquiza | $147,515.78 | Marianna, FL
  2. Erich Rogers | $122,017.13 | Round Rock, AZ
  3. Kaleb Driggers | $119,330.40 | Hoboken, GA
  4. Clay Smith | $110,570.20 | Broken Bow, OK
  5. Clay Tryan | $94,250.33 | Billings, MT
  6. Tyler Wade | $89,037.53 | Terrell, TX
  7. Cody Snow | $79,676.58 | Los Olivos, CA
  8. Clint Summers | $74,482.63 | Lake City, FL
  9. Brenten Hall | $73,505.74 | Jay, OK
  10. Rhen Richard | $71,544.76 | Roosevelt, UT
  11. Derrick Begay | $70,893.20 | Seba Dalkai, AZ
  12. Andrew Ward | $68,841.69 | Edmond, OK
  13. Coy Rahlmann | $63,925.97 | Ellsinore, MO
  14. Coleman Proctor | $62,755.13 | Pryor, OK
  15. Quinn Kesler | $62,403.22 | Holden, UT

NFR Qualifiers – Team Roping (Heelers)

Congrats! to the cowboys who have completed the season in the top 15 of the PRCA Team Roping (Heelers) standings 2021. Here are the top 15 cowboys list who are headed to the 2021 National Finals Rodeo Team Roping (Heelers) (notwithstanding if PRCA has updated the standings we will correct them):

  1. Junior Nogueira | $133,715.50 | Presidente Prudente, SP
  2. Travis Graves | $126,869.12 | Jay, OK
  3. Paden Bray | $116,936.91 | Stephenville, TX
  4. Jade Corkill | $110,570.20 | Fallon, NV
  5. Wesley Thorp | $102,036.91 | Throckmorton, TX
  6. Jake Long | $95,225.85 | Coffeyville, KS
  7. Trey Yates | $84,181.86 | Pueblo, CO
  8. Chase Tryan | $74,775.92 | Helena, MT
  9. Ross Ashford | $71,822.41 | Lott, TX
  10. Jeremy Buhler | $70,511.68 | Arrowwood, AB
  11. Logan Medlin | $69,335.01 | Tatum, NM
  12. Buddy Hawkins | $68,841.69 | Columbus, KS
  13. Douglas Rich | $63,849.20 | Herrick, IL
  14. Brady Minor | $61,878.45 | Ellensburg, WA
  15. Joseph Harrison | $61,688.45 | Marietta, OK

NFR Qualifiers – Saddle Bronc Riding

Congrats! to the cowboys who have completed the season in the top 15 of the PRCA Saddle Bronc Riding standings 2021. Here are the top 15 cowboys list who are headed to the 2021 National Finals Rodeo Saddle Bronc Riding (notwithstanding if PRCA has updated the standings we will correct them):

  1. Stetson Wright | $193,095.74 | Milford, UT
  2. Ryder Wright | $181,893.72 | Milford, UT
  3. Brody Cress | $142,224.71 | Hillsdale, WY
  4. Dawson Hay | $120,349.11 | Wildwood, AB
  5. Layton Green | $102,246.38 | Meeting Creek, AB
  6. Zeke Thurston | $99,802.49 | Big Valley, AB
  7. Chase Brooks | $97,387.90 | Deer Lodge, MT
  8. Kolby Wanchuk | $86,858.68 | Sherwood Park, AB
  9. Wyatt Casper | $84,947.58 | Miami, TX
  10. Tegan Smith | $82,814.34 | Winterset, IA
  11. Sage Newman | $82,717.59 | Melstone, MT
  12. Ben Andersen | $82,234.41 | Rocky Mountain House, AB
  13. Wade Sundell | $79,159.85 | Boxholm, IA
  14. Cody DeMoss | $74,798.76 | Heflin, LA
  15. Spencer Wright | $74,061.39 | Milford, UT

NFR Qualifiers – Tie-Down Roping

Congrats! to the cowboys who have completed the season in the top 15 of the PRCA Tie-Down Roping standings 2021. Here are the top 15 cowboys list who are headed to the 2021 National Finals Rodeo Tie-Down Roping (notwithstanding if PRCA has updated the standings we will correct them):

  1. Shane Hanchey | $175,079.46 | Sulphur, LA
  2. Westyn Hughes | $133,336.69 | Caldwell, TX
  3. Shad Mayfield | $131,915.83 | Clovis, NM
  4. Caleb Smidt | $126,879.19 | Bellville, TX
  5. Tuf Cooper | $120,474.03 | Decatur, TX
  6. Marcos Costa | $113,741.70 | Menard, TX
  7. Ty Harris | $110,355.97 | San Angelo, TX
  8. Justin Smith | $105,984.09 | Leesville, LA
  9. Marty Yates | $100,751.04 | Stephenville, TX
  10. Cory Solomon | $99,151.54 | Prairie View, TX
  11. Haven Meged | $98,925.41 | Miles City, MT
  12. Ryan Jarrett | $91,933.10 | Comanche, OK
  13. Hunter Herrin | $89,778.90 | Apache, OK
  14. Taylor Santos | $89,038.26 | Creston, CA
  15. John Douch | $88,874.19 | Huntsville, TX

NFR Qualifiers – Bull Riding

Congrats! to the cowboys who have completed the season in the top 15 of the PRCA Bull Riding standings 2021. Here are the top 15 cowboys list who are headed to the 2021 National Finals Rodeo Bull Riding (notwithstanding if PRCA has updated the standings we will correct them):

  1. Sage Kimzey | $264,738.71 | Salado, TX
  2. Stetson Wright | $204,100.35 | Milford, UT
  3. Clayton Sellars | $147,020.87 | Fruitland Park, FL
  4. Creek Young | $143,511.78 | Fort Scott, KS
  5. Josh Frost | $130,192.12 | Randlett, UT
  6. JB Mauney | $112,299.75 | Cotulla, TX
  7. Dustin Boquet | $112,011.26 | Bourg, LA
  8. Parker Breding | $102,713.88 | Edgar, MT
  9. Ky Hamilton | $101,747.48 | Mackay, QL
  10. Trey Benton | $98,791.92 | Richards, TX
  11. Braden Richardson | $98,539.81 | Jasper, TX
  12. Ruger Piva | $98,267.64 | Challis, ID
  13. Shane Proctor | $97,927.43 | Grand Coulee, WA
  14. Boudreaux Campbell | $96,910.00 | Crockett, TX
  15. Roscoe Jarboe | $95,778.20 | New Plymouth, ID

Do you want to watch Las Vegas NFR online? fd-uat-autopayroll-app.apps.dfes.wa.gov.au will help you to watch NFR Live Stream online. So, don’t miss a minute NFR 2021 action if you can’t attend at Las Vegas NFR this year. Join us and enjoy full 10-day online NFR live coverage.

The Las Vegas NFR will be held at the Thomas & Mack Arena from December 2-11, 2021.Watch NFR 2023 Live […]
